title: Developer Relations Director, EMEIA
summary: Apple is seeking a Developer Relations Leader for EMEIA based in London, England...
description: Articulate developer opportunities in the market and provide developer market insights...
key_qualifications: Substantial experience in product design and development and/or technology evangelism...
education_experience: University degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Software Engineering, Software Development, or Software Design Engineering is required. Business and marketing a plus
